title: Rito, Why?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: How come i have 8 keys and no chest to open? Why do you punish the people who only play a handful of champions? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
How is it a punishment? At worst, you are getting less bonuses than others who choose a different playstyle. That said, you get the chest when teammates get an S, so after enough matches you should be getting chests anyway.

I'm having the opposite problem...I don't have many champs left (that I ever play) to get a chest with.

Eh, my playstyle doesnt line up with the mastery system very well so ive only gotten a couple S ranks since the system came out anyway.

I lane a little, then roam a lot to snowball my allies off of the lead i get from lane. I miss a lot of cs doing that though, causing my mastery score to plummet.

Tons of keys from my wins, no chests.
